Hello Daniel,

My name is Ramon with Netwrix Technical Support and I have been assigned to this case. I will check internally regarding your questions about Easy-Lock and expiring licenses and get back to you.

In the meantime, could you please provide a screenshot of the EPP UI page at System Configuration → System Licensing → Licensing Status?

Thank you.

Best Regards, 
Ramon Torres | Technical Support Engineer

Also, please let me know when your available days and times are including time zone from Wednesday 23rd to Friday 25th of April. 

Thank you.

Best Regards, 
Ramon Torres | Technical Support Engineer

TextBody:
Hello Daniel,

Please refer to the following link: https://community.netwrix.com/t/version-5-9-4-2-released/3466

With EPP version 5.9.4.2, Easy Lock will use Enforced Encryption FIPS 140-3 Validated Engine, which introduces Netwrix Enforced Encryption Read-Only Mode for unmanaged computers. Please go to link above for further details.

The upgrade process begins with creating a snapshot of your current EPP Appliance. After that, please contact us to schedule a remote session during which we will assist you in downloading the EPP upgrade file. Once the snapshot is created and the upgrade package has been downloaded, we will log in to the EPP UI and start the installation.

The time required for installation can vary based on the size of your database; a backup of the EPP database is performed before the actual installation. Afterward, we can push the upgraded agent software to your devices by navigating to System Configuration → Client Software Upgrade in the EPP UI and selecting the computers to upgrade.

Upgrading to EPP 5.9.4.2 will enhance security for offline file tracing with enforced encryption.

Please review the link provided, and let me know if you decide to proceed with EPP 5.9.4.2.

Thank you.

Best Regards, 
Ramon Torres | Technical Support Engineer

Subject: Re: Netwrix Support Ticket #442451 - - License Expired Message when attempting to access Encrypted USB Drive [ ref:!00D70091pB.!500Qk0OAEn6:ref ]

Hello Daniel,

Please refer to the following link: https://community.netwrix.com/t/version-5-9-4-2-released/3466<https://urldefense.com/v3/__https://community.netwrix.com/t/version-5-9-4-2-released/3466__;!!OLgoXmg!U6y-N91rIOcRdn34vSQ-uRt-xKgyMAQAjFcY2woSnAIt43Bd5kGGM15nikbsyO6fUtgthK1YdI6G_opx0ASrOD3FUQ$>

With EPP version 5.9.4.2, Easy Lock will use Enforced Encryption FIPS 140-3 Validated Engine, which introduces Netwrix Enforced Encryption Read-Only Mode for unmanaged computers. Please go to link above for further details.

The upgrade process begins with creating a snapshot of your current EPP Appliance. After that, please contact us to schedule a remote session during which we will assist you in downloading the EPP upgrade file. Once the snapshot is created and the upgrade package has been downloaded, we will log in to the EPP UI and start the installation.

The time required for installation can vary based on the size of your database; a backup of the EPP database is performed before the actual installation. Afterward, we can push the upgraded agent software to your devices by navigating to System Configuration → Client Software Upgrade in the EPP UI and selecting the computers to upgrade.

Upgrading to EPP 5.9.4.2 will enhance security for offline file tracing with enforced encryption.

Please review the link provided, and let me know if you decide to proceed with EPP 5.9.4.2.

Thank you.

Best Regards,
Ramon Torres | Technical Support Engineer
